name: Takuya
desc: A blue oni who is currently in custody after attacking people in a group of Nobushi.

imgDesc.text: Takuya at the Mikawa Flower Festival

customize.name: Youkai
customize.desc: A group of nearly extinct supernatural beings from Inazuma.

customize.text: Takuya is a Youkai. Legend has it that the blue oni attacked people so crimson oni could defend them and live peacefully in a human world.

customize.name: Arataki Itto
customize.desc: The first and greatest head of the Arataki Gang, famed throughout Inazuma City's Hanamizaka... Wait, what? You've never heard of them? Are you trying to be funny here?

customize.text: A crimson oni who was accused of Takuya's crimes. Itto saved the blue oni from falling rocks when he wanted to sacrifice himself. Actively encourages Takuya to join the Arataki Gang.
